boofcv.alg.interpolate
Class NearestNeighborPixel<T extends ImageSingleBand>

java.lang.Object
  boofcv.alg.interpolate.NearestNeighborPixel<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterpolatePixel<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
NearestNeighborPixel_F32, NearestNeighborPixel_S16, NearestNeighborPixel_S32, NearestNeighborPixel_U8
public abstract class NearestNeighborPixel<T extends ImageSingleBand>
extends java.lang.Object
implements InterpolatePixel<T>

Performs nearest neighbor interpolation to extract values between pixels in an image.

Author:
Peter Abeles
